original_text: Some teachers of God's Law and some Pharisees were watching Jesus carefully. They wanted to find a reason to say that he was doing something wrong. So they watched Jesus to see if he would make the man well on the day of rest.
korean_text: 서기관과 바리새인들이 예수를 고발할 증거를 찾으려 하여 안식일에 병을 고치시는가 엿보니

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 법을 가르치는 사람들 중 일부는

sentences.original_text: and some Pharisees were watching Jesus carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 바리새인들도 예수님을 주의 깊게 지켜보고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to find a reason
to say that he was doing something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 잘못된 일을 하고 있다고 말하기 위한

sentences.original_text: to see if he would make the man well
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 사람을 고칠지 보기 위해
